about_the_game:
Garden of Witches is a roguelike filled with elaborate action while still managing to be cozy.
As long as you never give up, the garden will be saved!

She's waiting for you......

The witches need to throw a tea party!


The garden is on the brink of collapse,
all because these lazy, irresponsible witches don't keep their promises.
While it's tempting to let the garden perish to teach them a lesson, the protagonist, Sil, refuses to let that happen!
It's time to get a move on and save the garden, or else all that work building her perfect home will go to waste!

The garden is a dangerous place.


Use the abilities you gain by progressing through the stages to defeat monsters and "persuade" the unruly witches to join the tea party.
Don't worry if you get knocked down along the way.
The story will not change, and you will have the chance to try again with more powerful abilities.
You can always go back home to Improve your abilities and revise your strategy!

Controller Support

Garden of Witches supports most controllers, including Xbox and PlayStation.
You can also play mouse-free using only the keyboard. (Arrow keys, Z, X, C, A, D, Space, Tab, Esc)

Please support Garden of Witches by clicking "Add to your wishlist"!
